title: How do you get that free Gangplank skin?
body: I played him in a normal sr, i heard all you had to do was play him once right? or does it have to be in that Bilgewater sr mode?

replies.body: they're not being distributed until the ninth or whatever
You just have to own him and have a game played in general on him, as long as the game is against real people (or dominion since they are all bots).
You can also play Co-op vs. AI. :D (No customs!)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=AQ9fy8Ny,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-08-06T23:58:16.462+0000)
>
> You can also play Co-op vs. AI. :D (No customs!)

is it any game mode? like dominoin aram twisted treeline the event one or summoners rift? as long as its with gangplank and not a custom game it counts?
okay, i just wanted to make sure :)
